physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Presented with rectal bleeding, decreased appetite, weight loss, and decreased calibre of stool. Colonoscopy showed an area of firm bulging with oedematous mucosa in the upper rectum.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: No abnormalities noted in May, 2006, compared to findings in June, 2007.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Underwent low anterior resection and diverting ileostomy.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient received neoadjuvant chemoradiation treatment prior to surgery.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Underwent subtotal abdominal hysterectomy with bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy. Pathology report mentioned a few microscopic foci of high-grade serous carcinoma.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Surgical intervention following previous findings of adenocarcinoma.
Received three cycles of carboplatin and paclitaxel starting in December, 2008, indicating improvement.
